challenges.description: Skills: Communication · Code Review · Back-End Web Development

▪ Creation, design, conceptualization, implementation of software architecture for digital products & projects from different fields with a strong foundation of Machine learning, NLP (Natual Language Processing) AI, Big Data, Analytics, Performance & Optimization. 
▪ Day-to-day tasks: Software engineering, code review, releases, deployments, documentation, being responsible for the maintenance, development or correction of stable production applications, techincal interviews, >3 technical people in charge, small teams, technical leading.
▪ Back-End: Python 3.x, Django 2.x/3.x, Django Rest Framework (DRF), Pytest, Factory Boy, Faker, Virtualenvs, Flask, FastAPI, Whitenoise, WSGI, ASGI, Gunicorn, Celery, Jupyter Notebook, Swagger API, Redocs. 
▪ Front-End: Javascript, Typescript, VueJS, Vuex (template), Vuesax, Vuetify, Webpack, Babel, Jest, CSS, Sass.
▪ DevOps: Docker, Docker-Swarm, Kubernetes, Ansible, Terraform, GitLab CI/CD, GitLab Pipelines.
▪ Database: PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, other non-relational databases, taking care of every instance of DBMS administration, updates, creation of roles, users, groups, schemas, databases and everything related.
▪ Search engine: Elasticsearch, Solr.
▪ Products:
 ▪ Alizia - https://qaleon.com/alizia/
 ▪ Qalify - https://qaleon.com/qalify/
 ▪ Qanto - https://qaleon.com/qanto/
 ▪ Qalify - https://qaleon.com/qalify/
 ▪ QeKiero - https://qaleon.com/qekiero/
 ▪ iQal - https://qaleon.com/iqal/
 ▪ Innoapp - https://qaleon.com/innoapp/

▪ Leading CDN Spanish market focusing on Speed, Performance and Security.
▪ Python2.7/3.7, Django 1.11/2.2, Django Rest Framework, Open API, Swagger, Redocs, Sentry.
▪ Working with Git (Control Version) under Gitflow standard and Semver for API versions & tags.
▪ DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, GitLab CI/CD, Monitoring & Logging.
▪ GCP (Google Cloud Platform) Professional Data Engineer Certification course (Linux Academy). 
▪ Data Science Reports generating project in order to predict future requests load in CDN infrastructure of our clients using IPython, Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib & Scikit-Learn. 
▪ Testing TransparentCDN API using Pytest, Coverage, BDD, Factory Boy, Faker and other third-party pytest plugins in order to optimize, multi-processing tests and improve functionality !
▪ Celery Tasks using RabbitMQ as Broker to generate Distributed Tasks Queue.
▪ Migration ELK environment from v1 to latest version v7.x using ElasticSearch, Kibana, Logstash...
▪ Benchmarking, Profiling, Optimization Requests, SFTP, SSH, Server Configuration.
▪ Front-End tech-stack using VueJS, Vuex, Quasar...

▪ Migrate a huge application based on Payroll, Accounting, Billing, Purchases, Sales, CRM... from Visual Basic 6 // C# (.NET technologies) to AngularJS. Also, I performed advanced and custom SQL queries to the users.
▪ My second duty was fix, improved and upgraded the existing software.
Skills: Communication · Code Review · Back-End Web Development

▪ Web Applications Development, as CMS, e-commerce using latest technologies like: .NET, Razor, C# & SQL Server as Database.
▪ Front-End: HTML5, CSS3,JavaScript Libraries & Plugins: JQuery, JQueryUI.
▪ Frameworks & Libraries used: Bootstrap 4.0, Chart.JS, Dragster, CodeMirror... Also, an integral development of WebPages.
▪ Creation of Interactive Platforms using RestFul APIs & perform of Reports and Documentation.

▪ I was responsible for the storage, reception, relocation of the wares and also, the preparation of the
orders by selecting FR and its later packaging.
▪ Another of my functions was Picking in the FC (Central Floor)

I have worked in Stradivarius and Pull & Bear.
▪ My function was to profile, manage and organize the clothing of the store.
▪ I was also in charge of providing the best customer service.
▪ Besides, I took out all kinds of clothes, accessories ... from the store to the clients.

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription:
Primero de todo, debería de ser un trabajo Full-Remote, es decir, remoto aunque podría platearme ir a la oficina dependiendo de la situación. Un buen ambiente de trabajo, 
 más amigos que compañeros de trabajo !
Un sueldo que se corresponda a la actividad que realizo, flexibilidad horaria, algunos perks como fruta en la oficina o desarrollo profesional real. En fin, valorar y tratar al empleado como nos gustaría que tratasen a cada uno de nosotros.
